text:
Hey guys, I noticed this page <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/marketing/emails/single-send-api/v4> says that it only requires Marketing Hub - Free even though it is actually enterprise only...

Got my hopes up :sob:
Same with <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/marketing/emails/marketing-emails> - it should be pro/enterprise only
